APPEARANCE.name: Yuumeina Tsue no Mise no Tenshu

REGULAR.description:
After Cell War from Innocent Zero leaves, a rumor that Mash can`t use magic begins to spread around the school. On the other hand, Mash and his friends win the battle against Magia Lupus and take Lang Dorm`s coins for the Alder Dorm, thus bringing them a step closer to becoming Divine Visionaries. After school, they celebrate their victory with a party with Abel and Abyss joining them, when an owl suddenly appears and drops off a letter...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mash Burnedead and the Divine Visionaries
Mash Burnedead et les élus divins
Mash Burnedead to Shinkakusha-tachi
マッシュ・バーンデッドと神覚者たち

REGULAR.description:
The Bureau of Magic calls upon an emergency inquiry regarding the concealment of Mash`s lack of magic, and the Divine Visionaries gather one by one before Mash. The Divine Visionaries seek punishment for Mash on this, but Rayne and Wahlberg bow their heads down in a plea. Thus, the Divine Visionaries offer to defer the punishment on the condition that Mash becomes a Divine Visionary Candidate. Dot and the rest learn of this, and then everyone goes off to have some fun...?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mash Burnedead and the Home Visit
Mash Burnedead et le retour au bercail
Mash Burnedead to Jikka
マッシュ・バーンデッドと実家

REGULAR.description:
Right before the selection exam, Mash goes home with Finn and the rest of the gang, where Regro is waiting for him. For a brief moment, Mash and his friends can enjoy a calming break, but the prefect from Orca Dorm, Margarette Macaron, draws in closer to the group. Divine Visionary Rayne, however, stands in the way of Macaron. As Mash and his friends enjoy board games, a high-caliber fight between Macaron and Rayne unfolds in the background!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Rayne Ames and God`s Gift
Rayne Ames et les dons divins
Rayne Ames to Kami ni Erabareta Chikara
レイン・エイムズと神に選ばれた力

REGULAR.description:
The Divine Visionary Selection Exam finally begins. Traditionally, only those who have collected five or more coins were allowed to take the selection exam, but with Innocent Zero`s interfering and the exam being accelerated this year, anybody with three or more coins is qualified to take the exam. Mash, Finn, Lance, and Dot, now qualified to take the exam, challenge themselves to a dead-or-alive qualifying round, also known as "Deadervant`s Haunt."
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mash Burnedead and the Brawny Balloon
Mash Burnedead et le ballon increvable
Mash Burnedead to Kyouko na Fuusen
マッシュ・バーンデッドと強固な風船

REGULAR.description:
Mash and his friends safely passed the first round of the selection exam and were formed into a team of three out of the nine people who passed. Their next challenge is “The Life Crystal,” a competition where teams must simply break the other teams’ crystals. However, two of the three people on Mash`s team (consisting of him, Dot, and Finn) break the crystals given to them before the challenge even starts. With only one crystal left for their team, the three members start the game in different locations. Finn then encounters Carpaccio Luo-yang from the Orca Dorm…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Finn Ames and the Friend
Finn Ames et l’importance de l’amitié
Finn Ames to Tomodachi
フィン・エイムズと友達

REGULAR.description:
Finn refuses to abandon his friends and faces off against Carpaccio while Mash rushes to save Finn. There are 13 ancient wands said to exist in the Magic World, known as the “Master Canes.” Carpaccio was chosen by one of them and was considered invincible as he was able to void any wounds. Mash completely defeats him. Margarette defeats Carpaccio’s two other team members elsewhere, ending the challenge. And just before the last exam, somebody comes to meet Mash and his friends in the waiting room…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mash Burnedead and You Look, You Lose Your Life
Mash Burnedead et la partie de « Regarder n’est pas jouer »
Mash Burnedead to Abunai Acchi Muite Hoi
マッシュ・バーンデッドと危ないアッチ向いてホイ

REGULAR.description:
The last test of the Divine Visionary Candidate Exam is a one-on-one battle. The first match pits Mash against Margarette. Mash faces off against Macaron, a magic user said to have great magic power and is treated on the same level as a Divine Visionary. How and where will this tough fight end?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mash Burnedead and the Magical Maestro
Mash Burnedead et le sorcier virtuose
Mash Burnedead to Oto no Mahou Tsukai
マッシュ・バーンデッドと音の魔法使い

REGULAR.description:
Mash wins against Macaron, but Innocent Zero unexpectedly appears from the sky and freezes time in the exam venue. Wahlberg confronts Innocent Zero. Kaldo and other Divine Visionaries along with prefect Margarette, now unfrozen, face off against monsters to protect the students. At the same time, a battle between Mash and Cell War unfolds!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mash Burnedead and the Tall Tower
Mash Burnedead et la tour infernale
Mash Burnedead to Ookina Tou
マッシュ・バーンデッドと大きな塔

REGULAR.description:
Sitter Baby, one of Innocent Zero’s army of death row inmates, the Criminal Canes, turns Lance and Dot into babies. But Lance manages to defeat Sitter Baby with his overwhelming strength. Midair in the distant sky, Innocent Zero uses a forbidden spell to resurrect Adam Jobs, whom Wahlberg faces off with. Adam was considered a top legendary magic user in the Magic Realm and Wahlberg and Innocent Zero’s master at the same time…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Wahlberg Baigan and the Magic of Darkness
Wahlberg Baigan to Yami no Mahou
Wahlberg Baïgan et la magie des ténèbres
ウォールバーグ・バイガンと闇の魔法

REGULAR.description:
Although Cell used the true, summoned power of his wand, Mash decidedly defeated him. At the same time, Wahlberg shows his ever-powerful abilities to face off with Criminal Cane’s Necromance and Adam’s dark magic, both of which Innocent Zero controls. And finally, the peak showdown between Wahlberg and Innocent Zero begins!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Wahlberg Baigan and the Greatest Danger
Wahlberg Baigan to Saidai no Kiki
Wahlberg Baïgan et le pire des dangers
ウォールバーグ・バイガンと最大の危機

REGULAR.description:
In exchange for his life, Wahlberg attempts to whittle down Innocent Zero by manifesting Thirds, which opens the true power of his wand. Innocent Zero manages to escape the spell using his superior magic. Fallen into a desperate situation with no escape, Wahlberg is saved by…none other than Mash Burnedead himself!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mash Burnedead and the Origin of the Greatest Magic User
Mash Burnedead et les origines du plus puissant sorcier
Mash Burnedead to Saikyou no Mahou Tsukai no Hajimari
マッシュ・バーンデッドと最強の魔法使いの始まり

REGULAR.description:
Innocent Zero leaves a fusion of dead monster bodies that form a giant in his wake. Seeing Mash fight against this monster in a trapped, hopeless situation where all magic has become ineffective, the students from the school start to cheer him on.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mash Burnedead and His Good Friends
Mash Burnedead et les bons amis
Mash Burnedead to Ii Tomodachi
マッシュ・バーンデッドと良い友達
New Year Party
New Year Party
ニューイヤー・パーチー
Valentine Party
Valentine Party
バレンタイン・パーチー
Mashle: Shinkakusha Kouho Senbatsu Shiken Hen
Mashle: Magic and Muscles - The Divine Visionary Candidate Exam Arc
マッシュル 神覚者候補選抜試験編
物理魔法使马修 第二季
MASHLE: MAGIA E MÚSCULOS - O Arco do Exame a Candidato a Visionário Divino
Muscle Mage: I Cast Fist
肌肉魔法使-MASHLE- 神覺者候補選拔試驗篇
